title: Privacy Policy
intro: At E & D, your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our platform.

account.label: Account Information:
account.desc: Name, email address, password, and profile picture.

business.label: Business Information:
business.desc: Shop name, location, inventory, and contact details.

usage.label: Usage Data:
usage.desc: Pages visited, search queries, and interactions with the site.

items.display: To display accurate product availability in nearby stores.
items.improve: To improve user experience through analytics and personalization.
items.communicate: To communicate updates, changes, or promotions.

data_protection.title: Data Protection
data_protection.body: All personal data is stored securely and only accessed by authorized personnel. We do not sell or share your information with third parties unless required by law.

items.access: You can request to view, update, or delete your personal data at any time.
items.optout: You can opt-out of marketing communications via your profile settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: If you have any questions about this policy or our practices, feel free to reach out at: {{email}}

consent: By using E & D, you agree to this Privacy Policy.
